scoringRules.description: 1 point for every 25 Passing Yards (0.04 per)
2 points for every 2 Pt Conversion Passing
1 point for every 4 Passing First Downs (0.25 per)
1 point for every 10 Rushing Yards (0.1 per)
2 points for every 2 Pt Conversion Rushing
1 point for every 4 Rushing First Downs (0.25 per)
1 point for every 10 Receiving Yards (0.1 per)
2 points for every 2 Pt Conversion Receiving
1 point for every 2 Receiving First Downs (0.5 per)
1 point for every 4 Receiving First Downs (0.25 per)
6 points for every Offensive Fumble Recovery TD
6 points for every Kick Return TD
6 points for every Punt Return TD

allCategories.nameSingular: Offensive Point Allowed (FG, Pass TD, Rush TD)
allCategories.namePlural: Offensive Points Allowed (FG, Pass TD, Rush TD)

allCategories.nameSingular: Special Teams Point Allowed (Return TD, XP, 2-Pt Conv)
allCategories.namePlural: Special Teams Points Allowed (Return TD, XP, 2-Pt Conv)

allScoringRuleTypes.template: ${points} points for every ${forEvery} ${categoryPlural} after reaching ${boundLower} total ${categoryPlural}
${points} points for every ${forEvery} ${categoryPlural} for the first ${boundUpper} total ${categoryPlural}
${points} points for every ${forEvery} ${categoryPlural} between ${boundLower} and ${boundUpper} total ${categoryPlural} (inclusive)
${points} extra points when total ${categoryPlural} is greater than or equal to ${boundLower}
${points} extra points when total ${categoryPlural} is less than or equal to ${boundUpper}
${points} extra points when total ${categoryPlural} is between ${boundLower} and ${boundUpper} (inclusive)
${points} points for every ${forEvery} yards covered by a ${categorySingular}
${points} points for every ${forEvery} yards covered by a ${categorySingular} after yard ${boundLower}
${points} points for every ${forEvery} yards covered by a ${categorySingular} up to yard ${boundUpper}
${points} points for every ${forEvery} yards covered by a ${categorySingular} between yards ${boundLower} and ${boundUpper} (inclusive)
${points} extra points for every ${categorySingular} of ${boundLower} or more yards
${points} extra points for every ${categorySingular} of ${boundUpper} or less yards
${points} extra points for every ${categorySingular} between ${boundLower} and ${boundUpper} yards (inclusive)
